experiences: .profile.[0].parsedData.positions || [] | $map({ company: ?.org, title: ?.title, description: ?.summary, location: { text: ?.location, lat: null, lng: null }, date_start: null, date_end: null, skills: [] })
educations: ?? .profile.[0].parsedData.school || [] | $map({ school: ?.org, title: ?.degree, description: ?.summary, location: { text: ?.location, lat: null, lng: null }, date_start: null, date_end: null, skills: [] })
attachments: ?? .profile.[0].file.name | .profile.[0].file | { type: original, file_name: .name, original_file_name: .name, extension: .ext, public_url: .downloadUrl, file_size: .size, created_at: null }
